Reviews.Title: great price good product
Reviews.Author: christopher blum
Reviews.Content: very easy setup I have not hooked up to the internet yet but I installed a one terabyte hard drive and that is giving me 6 to 8 weeks of recording. picture is pretty clear night vision is awesomefor the price you pay for it I don't think you will find a better deal
